message.subject: Internship
message.content:
M1.1. Sorry Mr. McConnell but didn't attach on first email.
[Inform: Jonathan is sorry to Mr. McConnell for not attaching something (possibly his resume?) to a previous email]

message.subject: Internship
message.content:
M2.1. Jonathan,
[Conventional: salutation]
M2.2. Thanks for the email.
[Conventional: thanks]
M2.3. I enjoyed the evening in Norman as well.
M2.4. I also enjoyed the game vs KSU.
[Inform: Mark enjoyed evening in Norman and game vs. KSU]
M2.5. Your resume looks very impressive.
[Inform: Jonathan's resume looks impressive]
M2.6. I would continue to work through the university and make sure that you get on the interview schedule when we come back up.
[Inform: Jonathan should work through university and make sure he gets an interview with Enron when its employees come back]
M2.7. I'll hold on to your resume and pass it on to people in the pipeline group that may be looking for an intern.
[Inform: Mark will pass on Jonathan's resume to people at pipeline group interested in an intern]
M2.8. Best of luck,
[Conventional: best of luck]
